lines.text: I don't want to be a semi-maiden forever.
It's worse than nothing at all. It's like eating one peanut.
Well, I'll never call you Sam again!
Here's to all the bachelors in the world. May our tribe increase.
Anyway, that's where I was when the brains were being passed out.
You know where I was? Taking a bath in champagne.
Besides it's your fault Mr. Chalmers, remember that 'Welcome to Los Angeles' party at your house ? That's where I met that blonde. To tell you the truth I don't even know her name.
I'm an American citizen. I've got a right to be miserable anywhere in the world!
This is Paris. Take a look outside. This isn't a city. It's a great big 114 square miles of love potion. And a girl should take advantage.
